org.jpac

Class Handshake

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jpac.Handshake

  • public class Handshake
extends java.lang.Object
    implements a handshake mechanism to synchronize two modules which have a producer/consumer relationship

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Handshake(AbstractModule requestingModule, AbstractModule acknowledgingModule, java.lang.String identifier) 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void acknowledge()
      used by the acknowledging module to trigger an acknowledgement to be handled by the requesting module
      ProcessEvent acknowledged() 
      boolean isAcknowledged() 
      boolean isRequested() 
      void request()
      used by the requesting module to trigger a request to be handled by the acknowledging module
      ProcessEvent requested() 
      java.lang.String toString() 

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Handshake

        public Handshake(AbstractModule requestingModule,
         AbstractModule acknowledgingModule,
         java.lang.String identifier)
          throws SignalAlreadyExistsException
        Parameters:
        requestingModule - the requesting module (producer)
        acknowledgingModule - the acknowledging module (consumer)
        identifier - the identifier of this handshake (Corresponds to the identifiers of signals).
        Throws:
        SignalAlreadyExistsException

    • Method Detail

      • requested

        public ProcessEvent requested()
        Returns:
        returns a ProcessEvent which is fired, when the handshake is requested. Can be awaited by the acknowledging module

      • acknowledged

        public ProcessEvent acknowledged()
        Returns:
        returns a ProcessEvent which is fired, when the handshake is acknowledged. Can be awaited by the requesting module

      • request

        public void request()
             throws SignalAccessException
        used by the requesting module to trigger a request to be handled by the acknowledging module
        Throws:
        SignalAccessException

      • acknowledge

        public void acknowledge()
                 throws SignalAccessException
        used by the acknowledging module to trigger an acknowledgement to be handled by the requesting module
        Throws:
        SignalAccessException

      • isRequested

        public boolean isRequested()
                    throws SignalInvalidException
        Returns:
        returns true, if a request is pending, which is not acknoweldedged yet
        Throws:
        SignalInvalidException

      • isAcknowledged

        public boolean isAcknowledged()
                       throws SignalInvalidException
        Returns:
        returns true, if an acknowledgement is pending
        Throws:
        SignalInvalidException

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
